title: The best Wiggle Black Friday Deals | Huge savings on bikes and more
content:
We have scoured Wiggle’s Black Friday deals to bring you the best bargains from the UK-based online retailer.

With savings to be had in every category, including complete bikes, clothing and components, here is our selection of the best Wiggle Black Friday deals.

If you want to see all the deals, then check out Wiggle’s Black Friday Deals page in full.

Best Wiggle Black Friday Deals

Vitus Nucleus 27 VRS – £799 £399.99 (save 50%)

Wiggle

With SR Suntour XCR32 Boost forks, Shimano Deore gears and Clarks hydraulic disc brakes, this Vitus Nucleus 27 VRS represents good value for money at RRP, but at half price its an absolute bargain.

The bike is only available in L and XL sizes.

  • Buy the Vitus Nucleus 27 VRS with 50 per cent savings from Wiggle

Race Face Cinch Direct Mount Narrow Wide – £54.95 £4.99 (save 91%)

Wiggle

This Race Face Cinch chainring is made from a 7075-T6 alloy and is compatible with direct mount cranks.

The chainring come in a variety of colors and sizes and can be used with 1×9, 1×10, 1×11, and 1×12-speed drivetrains.

  • Buy the Race Face Cinch Direct Mount Narrow Wide with 91 per cent savings from Wiggle

LifeLine TT-01 Turbo Trainer (Magnetic) – £99.99 £14.99 (save 85%)

Wiggle

The TT-01 Turbo Trainer from LifeLine offers a great deal if you’re looking to start indoor training this year.

The magnetic resistance can be adjusted between six levels from your handlebar, and the trainer is compatible with 26in to 700c wheel sizes.

This trainer is not compatible with thru-axles.

  • Buy the LifeLine TT-01 Turbo Trainer with 85 per cent savings from Wiggle

Vitus ZX-1 Evo Rival AXS – £3,699.99 £1,999.99 (save 46%)

Wiggle

The Vitus ZX-1 Evo features a full carbon fibre monocoque frame and a size-specific fork that Vitus says makes the bike 45 per cent more aero than the previous model.

This model features SRAM’s Rival AXS groupset and a Prime Attaquer Aluminium Clincher Disc wheelset wrapped in 25c Michelin Power Cup Classic TS TLR tyres.

  • Buy the Vitus ZX-1 Evo Rival AXS with 46 per cent savings from Wiggle

Garmin Forerunner 955 GPS – £479.99 £359.99 (save 25%)

Wiggle

Garmin’s Forerunner 955 GPS has a combination of traditional buttons and a touchscreen, which should help when navigating its many functions with cold hands this winter.

The watch provides advanced training features, recovery suggestions and pre-loaded mapping.

Garmin says the Forerunner 955 GPS has a battery life of up to 15 days in smartwatch mode, 42 hours in GPS mode and 80 hours in UltraTrac mode.

  • Buy the Garmin Forerunner 955 GPS with 25 per cent savings from Wiggle

Nukeproof Scout 275 Race – £1,399 £699.99 (save 50%)

Nukeproof

The Nukeproof Scout is based on an aggressive triple-butted hydro-formed alloy frame that sees a 64.5-degree head angle and rolls on a 27.5in wheels.

This entry-level Race model features a 140mm RockShox Recon Silver RL fork, a Shimano Deore 10-speed drivetrain and 2.6in-wide tyres from Schwalbe.

With 50 per cent savings, this looks to be a great entry point into mountain biking.

  • Buy the Nukeproof Scout 275 Race with 50 per cent savings from Wiggle

Vitus Sommet 290 CRX – £4,599 £2,599.99 (save 43%)

Vitus

We reviewed the top-tier Sommet 297 AMP as part of our Bike of the Year test this year, and were impressed by its lively nature and fun-loving ride feel, scoring it 4 stars.

This Sommet 290 CRX sits just below the flagship model but is no slouch in the spec department, featuring a 170mm Fox Factory 38 fork and a Fox Float X2 Factory rear shock controlling the 162mm of rear travel.

The bike also has SRAM’s new GX Eagle Transmission drivetrain, which does away with derailleur hangers.

There is no doubt this bike offered great value for money before the sale price, but at £2,599.99 it is an absolute bargain.

  • Buy the Vitus Sommet 290 CRX with 43 per cent discount from Wiggle

Prime Primavera 56 Carbon Disc Wheelset – £899.99 £539.99 (save 40%)

Prime

The Prime Primavera 56 Carbon Disc Wheelset is designed with flat road racing, time trailing and triathlons in mind. It features a carbon fibre rim and the brand’s own SR1D CNC-machined hub.

DT Swiss straight-pull spokes are used to lace the wheels together, and the rim is tubeless-ready with valves included should you wish to set them up tubeless.

  • Buy the Prime Primavera 56 Carbon Disc Wheelset with a 40 per cent savings from Wiggle

Selle Italia SLR Kit Carbonio Flow Open-Fit Saddle with Carbon Rails – £219.99 £69.99 (save 68%)

Wiggle

Selle Italia’s SLR Kit Carbonio features CarboKeramic rails, which are said to reduce weight and increase the compliance of the saddle.

The outer of the saddle is made from Fibra-Tek, which Selle Italia says gives the saddle increased durability.

The brand claims the saddle tops the scales at around 130g (+/- 5g).

  • Buy the Selle Italia SLR Kit Carbonio Flow Open-Fit Saddle with Carbon Rails with a 68 per cent saving from Wiggle

SRAM Code R Rear Disc Brake – £145 £49.99 (save 66%)

Wiggle

We were impressed by SRAM’s Code R brakes when we tested them, praising their incredible power and decent modulation, and awarding them four stars.

The brakes are the biggest in SRAM’s range with four-piston calipers and are designed for electric, enduro and downhill bikes.

  • Buy the SRAM Code R Rear Disc Brake with a 66 per cent saving from Wiggle

Castelli Perfetto ROS Long Sleeve Jersey – £220 £138 (save 37%)

Wiggle

The Perfetto ROS features a water-repellent Gore-Tex Infinium fabric, which is said to fend off rain or snow should you get caught out when on a winter ride.

A fleeced front panel is used to retain heat on those cold rides, while a lighter, stretch material allows for breathability elsewhere.

  • Buy the Castelli Perfetto ROS Long Sleeve Jersey with 37 per cent savings from Wiggle

Oakley Jawbreaker Dual Lens Photochromic Sunglasses – £280 £159.99 (save 43%)

Oakley

Oakley’s Jawbreaker heralded the return of the big-lens sunnies when they were first released, with an interchangeable one-piece lens design.

These glasses come with a photochromic lens that adapts to light levels, and a Prizm lens that’s said to enhance vision by boosting colour, contrast and clarity.

  • Buy the Oakley Jawbreaker Dual Lens Photochromic Sunglasses with a 43 per cent saving from Wiggle

Tacx Neo 2T Smart Trainer – £1,199 £1,106 (save 8%)

Dave Caudrey / Immediate Media

We awarded the Neo 2T Smart Trainer 4.5 stars when we tested it, praising its accurate data and mains-free functionality.

The trainer has a claimed power accuracy of within 1 per cent and an immersive real-road feel that mimics cobbled roads through the pedals.

  • Buy the Tacx Neo 2T Smart Trainer with a 8 per cent saving from Wiggle
author: Nick Clark
